<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow">
    <sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <acls/>
        <active>true</active>
        <annotation/>
        <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api>
        <category/>
        <copied_from/>
        <copied_from_name/>
        <description><html></html><p>Calls appropriate subflow by using configuration variables of the provider.</p>
 <p><b>Inputs:</b>
  </p>
   <ul><li><b>Password Reset Request</b> - Password request record.</li><li><b>New Password</b> - Password for the user being reset.</li><li><b>Current Password</b> - The current password of the user.</li><li><b>Action</b> Current action choices i.e. Reset Password, Change Password, Unlock Account, Get Lock State.</li></ul>

 <p><b>Outputs:</b>
  </p>
   <ul><li><b>Status</b> - Will be set to 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs or 'Pending' in case of Async request</li><li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li><li><b>Is Flow</b> - 'True' if the password reset process is configured to execute via Integration Hub flows. 'False' if the password reset process is configured to execute via workflows.</li><li><b>Context ID</b> - Context Id of the workflow. Populated only when the password reset process is configured to execute via workflows</li></ul>

 <p><b>Error Messages:</b></p>
 <p>Error messages for this action is populated from the corresponding subflow executed.</p></description>

        <description><html></html><p>Calls appropriate subflow by using configuration variables of the provider.</p>
 <p><b>Inputs:</b>
  </p>
   <ul><li><b>Password Reset Request</b> - Password request record.</li><li><b>New Password</b> - Password for the user being reset.</li><li><b>Current Password</b> - The current password of the user.</li></ul>

 <p><b>Outputs:</b>
  </p>
   <ul><li><b>Status</b> - Will be set to &#39;Success&#39; if the request succeeds or &#39;Error&#39; if a failure occurs.</li><li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li><li><b>Is Flow</b> - &#39;True&#39; if the password reset process is configured to execute via Integration Hub flows. &#39;False&#39; if the password reset process is configured to execute via workflows.</li><li><b>Context ID</b> - Context Id of the workflow. Populated only when the password reset process is configured to execute via workflows</li></ul>

 <p><b>Error Messages:</b></p>
 <p>Error messages for this action is populated from the corresponding subflow executed.</p>
 
</description>
